# Weave
> Weave is a lightweight toolkit for tracking and evaluating LLM applications, built by Weights & Biases.

This document contains links to all the documentation for Weave.

## Docs

- [introduction](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/wandb/weave/master/docs/docs/introduction.md): 
- [quickstart](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/wandb/weave/master/docs/docs/quickstart.md):
